title: Are Migrants ‘Free to Leave Detention Centers Any Time’?
subtitle: A widely-shared meme in July 2019 vastly overstated the freedom of movement available to migrants being held in U.S. immigration detention facilities.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: As of July 2019, migrants are "free to leave" U.S. immigration detention centers and return to their countries of origin, at will.
